page.title: 16READYFIELDS FARM,BEESTHORPE
page.content: {Readyfields Farm. Mr.Boddy owns his own farm.He has 550 acres on 44 big fields. The farm has 6 tractors(109 H.P.),2 loaders and 2 grass cutters.He has 2 drills,1 plough. He has 5 horses,20 lambs and 12 yows(the sheep are called Jacob Scotch Black Face). He cuts 25 acres of grass a day which is turned into grass nuts.They have 2 sheds,1 shed holds 150 tons and the other holds 1500 tons.They have 9 acres of pasture land for sheep and horses. They have half an acre for bales and a lot of woodland. The cutters have a 13 foot bed, when they are picking up it has a 5 foot bed. He bales some of his grass. The grass drying covers two acres.
